banner.draft: Пройдите предквалификацию и подайте предложение до завершения приёма предложений.
banner.submitted: Заявка на рассмотрении. Связь с заказчиком – в чате запроса.

action.title: Подать заявку на предквалификацию / NDA
action.text: Убедитесь, что заявка содержит полный комплект документов. Изменить заявку после подачи невозможно.

description.title: Описание и документы
description.notice: Ознакомьтесь с требованиями Заказчика на вкладке "Запрос"

registries.title: Accreditation
registries.text: To submit an offer, it is required to be accredited in these Customer registries:

banner.changing: Submit a modified bid. The customer is considering your previous bid.
banner.draft: Submit an bid before the deadline for accepting offers
banner.submitted: Change the bid to increase the chance of winning.
banner.summarize: Update the documents in the "Commercial offer and documentation" section

title.true: Price of your proposal, incl. VAT
title.false: Price of your proposal, excl. VAT

documents.title: Commercial bid and documentation
documents.text: You can also attach documents after receiving offers

competitors_ahead.true: Competitors are ahead of you on some positions

alternative.title: Alternative proposal
alternative.info: To start preparing an alternative proposal, click the button below.

nonexistent.title: My proposal
nonexistent.info: Request completed, proposal submission not possible

refused.title: Your company has refused to participate in the request
refused.sub_title:
You can return to the request and submit an offer
before the deadline for accepting offers {{value}}

blocked.title: The customer excluded you from the request
blocked.sub_title:
You cannot participate in the request at the discretion of the customer.
To clarify the details, contact the customer

confirm_recall_dialog.title: Withdraw the offer?
confirm_recall_dialog.text:
To the customer and other participants this offer will be unavailable.
Offer can be edited and submit again before summing up

esg.title: Sustainable growth of your business
esg.text: Certify and get your ESG provider status
